assetSymbol.description: The human readable short name for the asset e.g. eth for Ether

assetName.description: The complete human readable name of the asset

assetArcId.description: The permanent, unique identifier of the asset in ARC, that remains the same even if assetSymbol must change

nativeBlockchainName.description: The name of the blockchain network that this asset helps secure

nativeBlockchainContractType.description: The abbreviated name of the contract standard for the nativeBlockchain of this asset

assetAddresses.description: Contains additional details about deployements of this asset on various blockchains

blockchainName.description: The name of the blockchain where this asset is deployed

address.description: The address of this asset on the blockchain

blockchainScannerUrl.description: The complete URL to the asset contract on the blockchain's scanner

contractType.description: The abbreviated name of the contract standard for this blockchain

decimals.description: The number of decimals that should be used to normalize transaction values for this asset e.g. 18 for Ether

genesisTransactionHash.description: The transaction hash that corresponds to the first appearance of this asset on this blockchain

nativeGenesisTransactionHash.description: The transaction hash that corresponds to the onChainCreationDate of this asset on its nativeBlockchain

nativeOnChainCreationDate.description: The date and time in ISO8601 format of when this asset first appeared on  its nativeBlockchain

blockNumber.description: The exact number of the block in which this asset first appeared

consensusMechanism.description: The consensus mechanism of the asset's native blockchain

classificationTags.description: The descriptive identifiers that indicate the use-cases of this asset

website.description: The asset's primary website with mission statement and additional details

whitePaperUrl.description: A direct link to the asset's whitepaper

sourceCode.description: A direct link to the development repository of the asset

socialMedia.description: Platforms on which the asset creators or governance entity provides announcements and updates

platform.description: The complete, human-readable name of the platform

url.description: A direct link to the asset's page on the platform

exploits.description: Details regarding exploits and hacks that this asset was involved in

date.description: The date and time in ISO8601 format of the exploit or hack involving this asset

detailsUrl.description: A direct link to a page that provides details about the explot or hack
